meaningMnemonic: Remember how 教育 means "education?" Well, the 育 here is referring to the education word, but this time it's a <kanji>body</kanji> education. What do you call the body education at school? <vocabulary>Physical education</vocabulary> or <vocabulary>PE</vocabulary>.
readingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word, which usually means on'yomi readings from the kanji. If you know the readings of your kanji you'll know how to read this as well.
